name: Temptris
description:
Made for Godot Game Jam at the last minute.

It's Tetris except in addition to all the mechanics you know and love, tiles are ice, molten, or cooled. When an ice tile touches a molten tile, it melts away, cooling surrounding tiles.

Game is incomplete at the moment, but pretty good for starting Sunday night :P
